recipes.name: Älplermagronen (Alpine macaroni)
ingredients: ~150g (1/3 lb) medium soft cheese. Appenzeller works best. Gruyère would be my go-to alternative.

recipes.name: Aljotta
ingredients: Mint, small amount (optional, I never use it myself as it's too overpowering)

recipes.name: Almeirim Stone Soup
ingredients: chouriço negro or firm type of blood sausage
mixed meat chouriço or mediterranean smoked sausage

recipes.name: Apple Chicken
ingredients: One glass (33c) of wine or cognac.

recipes.name: Ardei umpluti with meat
ingredients: Around 120g of ground beef meat per person.
Condiments of your choice: Parsley, origan or cumin.

recipes.name: Asian Style Chicken with Sticky Sauce
Aussie Snags (sausage sizzle)
ingredients: Wood chips (optional, fuel for smokey flavour)

recipes.name: Baba's Feta Pasta
ingredients: Whole small courgette (Cut to small pieces)
6 Medium Mushrooms (Cut smallish and small stalk)
1 Chicken stock (Added to 3/4 Mug boiling water)

recipes.name: Baby Back Ribs
ingredients: Applewood (or other sweet cooking wood such as cherry or maple)
1 container of barbecue rub ([Traeger Pork and Poultry Rub](https://www.traeger.com/rubs-spices/pork-poultry) is recommended)
Barbecue Sauce ([Oakland Dust, The One BBQ Sauce](https://www.sincerelysf.com/products/oakland-dust-the-one-bbq-sauce-1) is recommended)

recipes.name: Baked Mostaccioli
ingredients: 24 oz or 1 jar of Fradiavolo Sauce ([Victoria](https://victoriapastasauces.com/product/fradiavolo-sauce/))
1 box Mostaccioli Rigati or Penne Rigati ([Ronzoni](https://www.google.com/search?q=mostaccioli+rigati&tbm=shop))
2x 2 quart (8) baking dishes or 1 large baking dish (see picture below)

recipes.name: Baked pasta with broccoli, boiled eggs and scamorza cheese
Banana Bread
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups mashed bananas (this is around 4-5 bananas)
1 cup sugar (brown or white is fine)

recipes.name: Basic Meatballs
ingredients: 1/3 cup milk (I use 2% but doesn't matter too much)
1/4 cup yellow onion diced (about 1/2 small yellow onion)

recipes.name: Three Bean Salad
ingredients: 1/3 cup Salad Oil (olive oil, canola, or sunflower)

recipes.name: Beef Jerky
ingredients: 2 tbsp. Worcestershire sauce or Teriyaki sauce
1 Lb. (450 g) beef (flank or skirt steak is ideal)
Other common seasonings may include (¼ tsp. of) cayenne pepper, cheese powder, and/or white pepper

recipes.name: Beef Kidney
ingredients: 400g croutons or toasted bread in pieces

recipes.name: Traditional beef or lamb stew
ingredients: Thyme, rosemary and some bay leaves.
(Optional) a bottle of stout or porter for some extra flavour.

recipes.name: Beef Tips in Gravy on Sour Cream Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: Any lean, tough cut of meat (ex. round steak)
Unprocessed animal fat of some kind (ex. beef suet, mutton fat)

recipes.name: Belgian pear syrup
ingredients: 7 pears (Quality doesn't matter; you can argue that overripe pears are better because they have more sugar content.)
a small handful of dates, raisins, dried apricots or prunes (optional -- you can experiment with these; they can bring out some nice flavors.)

recipes.name: Bloody Mary Mix
ingredients: 1 (46 fluid ounce) bottle tomato-vegetable juice cocktail

recipes.name: Bolognese Sauce
ingredients: 350 grams veal mince (if you cant find veal replace with pork)

recipes.name: Brigadeiro
ingredients: Three or four spoons of chocolate powder or cocoa powder.
One spoon of butter (Actual butter and preferably unsalted. No margarine!)

recipes.name: Hamburger dressing
ingredients: 1 clove garlic, if using mayonnese and not aioli (optional)

recipes.name: Butter Chicken Masala Curry
ingredients: 1 small bunch of coriander leaves / cilantro, for ganish

recipes.name: Cacio e Pepe
ingredients: Peppercorns (you can also use pepper but it will change the flavour)

recipes.name: Cannellini Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 can Cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

recipes.name: Carbonade Flamande (Traditional Flemish beef stew)
ingredients: brown beer (try to get a strong, tasty one): 1L | 4 cups

recipes.name: Carbonara
ingredients: Guanciale or Smoked Pancetta (cleaned and cubed): 150 g | 5 oz

recipes.name: Cheesy Potato Bake
ingredients: As much bacon as you want to garnish

recipes.name: Chicken Biscuit Potpie Recipe
ingredients: 1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted

recipes.name: Chicken in Red Wine Vinegar Sauce
ingredients: 1 whole chicken, cut into 10 pieces (alternatively, use breasts or legs)
1 cup/240 milliliters crème fraîche or heavy cream

recipes.name: Chicken Paprikash
ingredients: 1/4 cup Hungarian paprika or regular paprika

recipes.name: Chicken Pasta Casserole
ingredients: (Optional) More mozzarella and parmesan for fans of cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Satay with Peanut Sauce
ingredients: 2 lbs boneless chicken breast or thigh

recipes.name: Chicken Stock or Bone Broth
ingredients: a whole raw chicken with organs removed (Drumsticks or thighs alone might suffice if a whole chicken is unavailable.)

recipes.name: Slow-cooked Chicken Tacos
ingredients: cheese (either shredded Mexican blend or crumbling cheese)
cilantro, tomato, lettuce, other desired taco contents

recipes.name: Chicken Tenders Airfried
ingredients: Seasoning: salt and pepper with cayenne or paprika (optional)

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: 2-1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-1/2-inch cubes

recipes.name: Chicken, Tomato and Spinach Curry
ingredients: Fresh tomatoes of any variety (10 - 15 medium sized)
Curry powder of your favourite variety
Any extra herbs or spices to your taste

recipes.name: Chicken Wings
ingredients: Enough Frank's RedHot Sauce to marinate and top dress*

recipes.name: Chimichanga
ingredients: Plain Greek Yogurt or Sour Cream

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 225 g 50-70% dark chocolate chips or semi-sweet milk chocolate chips

recipes.name: Chorizo & Chickpea Soup
ingredients: Butter and sunflower oil, for frying

recipes.name: Keto Coconut Bread
ingredients: ½ tsp or less of Xanthan Gum (optional, to have a more stick bread)

recipes.name: Colcannon Bake
ingredients: 7 Tbsp Butter, cut into small chunks

recipes.name: Coleslaw
ingredients: One large head of green cabbage

recipes.name: Collard Greens with Smoked Duck and Parsnips
ingredients: 1 large bunch collard greens chopped into ribbons

recipes.name: Corn Salsa
ingredients: Few pinches of Cilantro, finely chopped

recipes.name: Country Crisp Cereals
ingredients: Rice Flour (or any other flour) (20 g - 55mL)

recipes.name: Tunisian Couscous
ingredients: 2 lb lamb stew meat , cut into large pieces
4 zucchini , peeled lengthwise, alternately leaving a layer of skin
4 green hot peppers , fried in oil (optional)

recipes.name: Cream Cheese
ingredients: 6g of of citric acid (contained in 130ml of lemon juice)

recipes.name: Cuca Italiana
ingredients: 3/4 of a cup of warm water
Optional herbs and spices: Fennel seeds, cinammon, cloves. Don't put too many though.

recipes.name: Danish Pancake
ingredients: a little bit of salt (1/3 of a teaspoon)

recipes.name: Demi-glace
ingredients: 1 qt (32 oz, 946mL) **low-sodium** broth or stock (I prefer Pacific Foods)

recipes.name: Dianne's Southwestern Cornbread Salad
ingredients: 1 (1-ounce) envelope buttermilk Ranch salad dressing mix
1 (15-ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained

recipes.name: Dominican Spaghetti
ingredients: 1 tbsp Chicken Bouillon Cube or Adobo

recipes.name: Dried tomato & plum bread spread
ingredients: pinch of chilli (optional, if you like it to be spicy)

recipes.name: Drunken beans (Pintos Borrachos)
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups of pinto beans (can be dried or canned)
2 tbsp chilli powder(depends how hot you like it)

recipes.name: Dulce de Leche
ingredients: Half a teaspoon of baking soda.
Two glass marbles (Optional, but it is a traditional way to prevent sticking, and they will not break in the process.)

recipes.name: Erwtensoep (Dutch pea soup)
ingredients: 3 1/2 ounces / 100 grams pork belly (Dutch speklapjes or thick-cut bacon)

recipes.name: Exotic Ginger Cumin Chicken
ingredients: 2 lbs Boneless Skinless Chicken, cut bite-size

recipes.name: Fajitas
ingredients: 1 lb Chicken Breasts or Skirt Steak, bones/skin removed
1/2 each Green, Red, and Yellow Bell Pepper, thinly sliced

recipes.name: Fall Vegetable and Chickpea Curry
ingredients: 1 large Sweet Potato, peeled and cut into half-inch chunks
1 small Zucchini, cut into half-inch chunks
1 Red Pepper, cut into half-inch pieces
28 oz can Chickpeas, rinsed and drained

recipes.name: Farcies tomatoes
ingredients: Condiments of your choice: Parsley, origan or cumin.

recipes.name: Fennel White Bean and Kale Soup
Flammkuchen
ingredients: 400g Pizza dough (either bought or from [Pizza Dough](/pizza-dough))
1 onion (I prefer the red ones for optical reasons)
150g bacon (you can replace it with mushrooms or other vegetables)
2 big spoons of sour creme or creme fraiche

recipes.name: Fondue
ingredients: 800 g (1.7 lbs) swiss cheese (50/50 mix of Gruyère and Emmentaler recommended)

recipes.name: French mustard sauce porkchops (Côtes de porc charcutières)
ingredients: gerkins: a dozen medium sized ones

recipes.name: French Onion Soup
ingredients: Melty cheese, preferably guereye or swiss

recipes.name: French Toast
ingredients: 1/2 Cup of milk (1/4 for a more solid consistency)

recipes.name: Frijol con puerco
ingredients: **1 kg of black beans**, rinsed and drained.
**2 kg** of pork loin or ribs cut into **5 cm** pieces, it can be mixture of the two.
**1 white onion** without skin cut, in half.
**4 branches of fresh _epazote_**, or **15 branches of coriander** tied with kitchen twine.
**1 Mexican avocado**, halved, pitted, pulp cut into squares.
**Yucatan style tomato sauce** or _Chiltomate_ to taste (**optional**)

recipes.name: Frittata
ingredients: Thinly sliced meat (prosciutto, shaved chicken, sandwich steak, etc.) (Optional)

recipes.name: Full English Breakfast
ingredients: 4 raw sausages (English sausages to be authentic)
4 slices of bacon (English back bacon to be authentic)
half a tin (200g) of baked beans
half a cup (120g) of button mushrooms

recipes.name: Galinha Caipira
ingredients: A whole ckicken weighing close to 2,5kg (roughly 3 pounds). Avoid industrially grown birds, as those can make the stew very greasy and flavorless.
A cup of diced onions of any kind.
Half a cup of diced chives.
A full kettle of boiled water.

recipes.name: Garam Masala
ingredients: Mace (Optional): Mace is a dried flower originating from the Nutmeg plant. Use no more than 3 strands of this flower.

recipes.name: Garlic Toast
ingredients: Any kind of firm, thin, sliced bread (Sourdough, Baguette)
Garlic-infused olive oil (Optionally substitute butter or regular olive oil)

recipes.name: Ginataang Kalabasa
ingredients: One medium sized squash that is easy to peel (butternut squash is usually best)

recipes.name: Broccoli with Ginger and Garlic Sauce
ingredients: Sherry or regular white wine (you cook with what you drink with!) (1 tablespoon)

recipes.name: Glühwein - mulled wine
ingredients: 300 ml Cassis-Juice (Johannesbeer), if you can't find it you can replace it with another juice, I did it e.g. with cranberry pomegranate juice
1 bottle 700ml red wine (I prefer Primitivo/Zinfandel), don't buy a cheap cooking wine, you want to drink it :)
1 spoon ginger powder (or a bit of fresh ginger)
if you don't have the spices you can also just throw in sweet cinamon tea bags instead (or similar), they contain most spices - I took 6 teabags for 1 litre

recipes.name: Granola
ingredients: 1 cup Chopped Nuts (Almonds, Pumpkin Seeds, etc)
1 cup Dried Fruit (Apricots, Unsweetened Cranberries, Dates, etc)

recipes.name: Greek Easter Cookies
ingredients: 1 egg yolk whisked to brush cookies
Enough flour to make a soft pliable dough (about 9 cups or a bit more)

recipes.name: Greek Salad
ingredients: 2 cup assorted Lettuce, chopped or torn
1/2 cup pitted Black Olives (preferably brine-cured), coarsely chopped
Salt and freshly ground Black Pepper

recipes.name: Grilled Mackerel with Miso Soup and Squash
Grostoli
ingredients: 4 tablespoons of a 40% a.b.v. spirit. Cachaça is the main one, Rum or Grappa will do.

recipes.name: Shrimp and Sausage Gumbo
ingredients: 1 tbsp Cajun or Creole Seasoning (Creole Kick)
(Optional) Instead of chicken broth, you can use your own shrimp stock

recipes.name: Gypsy Soup
ingredients: 2 cup Sweet Potatoes, chopped and peeled

recipes.name: Hamburger Patties
ingredients: 2 tablespoons of fat or salad oil

recipes.name: Hearty Breakfast Oatmeal
ingredients: 1/2 cup Large Flake Oats (no partially cooked quick-oats allowed!)
ON Vanilla Ice Cream Protein Powder (optional)

recipes.name: Honey Garlic Chicken with Broccoli and Brown Rice
ingredients: 1 head broccoli (you can use really any amount of broccoli)

recipes.name: Hummus
ingredients: 1/2 cup of tahini (also known as tehina)
1/4 cup (or more, to taste) of lemon juice, fresh preferred - this is about 1 1/2 to 2 lemons' worth
1 (or 2) clove(s) of garlic, roughly chopped (fresh or frozen pre-chopped is fine, but not dry)
1/4 teaspoon cumin, ground (if you have whole, toast in a dry pan until fragrant before grinding)
1/4 teaspoon za'atar (optional, if you can find it)
1 Tablespoon of olive oil, plus more for serving

recipes.name: Instant Tom Yam Kung noodle soup
ingredients: 2 packages of vegetable- or tom yam-quick noodles
A few salad leaves (or practically any veggie you have in the fridge)

recipes.name: Irish Coffee
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger Irish cream liqueur

recipes.name: Italian Bread
ingredients: 600g or 5 cups bread flour (or all-purpose if not available)
1 packet (appr. 2 1/4 tsp or 7g) active dry yeast

recipes.name: Japanese Noodle Soup
ingredients: 1 Red Chilli, sliced and deseeded (Optional, but recommended)
375g Ramen Noodles (Medium Egg Noodles work well too)

recipes.name: 'Kettle Chips'
ingredients: 1 Russet Potato, or other potato with high starch and low moisture. The amount of starch effects the crunchiness of the chip.
Peanut Oil for frying (at least 1 to 2 inches in the pan)
Salt or seasoning of your choice

recipes.name: Kettle Corn
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or oil of your choice
2 tablespoons of sugar (brown sugar works too)

recipes.name: Kvass
ingredients: 3 slices of black bread (e.g. pumpernickel bread, rye bread)
1 pkg (7 g) of active dry yeast

recipes.name: Lamb Biriyani
ingredients: 1 Tbsp of Chilli Powder or Hungarian Smoked Paprika
Juice of 1/2 Lemon or 1 tsp of Vinegar

recipes.name: Lasagna
ingredients: [Fresh Bolognese sauce](/bolognese-sauce) or about 1 litre worth of store-bought sauce

recipes.name: Lebanese Lentil Soup
ingredients: ¼ cup of lemon juice, more to taste

recipes.name: Lemon and oregano chicken traybake
ingredients: 5 oregano sprigs / heavy sprinkle of oregano leaves

recipes.name: Lemon juice salad dressing
ingredients: Lemon juice from half a lemon

recipes.name: Sopa de Lentejas
ingredients: 1 cup dry brown lentils, soaked overnight and drained

recipes.name: Lenten Chili
ingredients: 4 15oz cans of kidney beans (or 6 cups cooked beans)
1 29oz large can tomato sauce (or 4 cups fresh tomato sauce)
1 15oz can diced tomatoes (or 1 large diced tomato with skin removed)
1 cup cooked white or brown rice

recipes.name: Limoncello
ingredients: 5-7 organic lemons (regular lemons are covered in wax)

recipes.name: Maque Choux
ingredients: A good bit of grease (about a handful)

recipes.name: Marinated pork steaks
ingredients: 4 ¼ inch thick boneless pork shoulder steaks

recipes.name: Mayonnaise or aioli
ingredients: 1 whole egg or 2 egg yolks, preferably at room temperature
2-4 cloves of garlic for aioli, don't include for mayonnaise

recipes.name: Medieval Beef Soup
ingredients: Around three to four large turnips with their greens attached

recipes.name: Mexican Meat Loaf
ingredients: 1 cup Black Beans (canned), rinsed and drained

recipes.name: Mushroom risotto
ingredients: 400g risotto rice (Arborio, Carnaroli or Vialone Nano)

recipes.name: Mushroom Stroganov
ingredients: 8 oz uncooked pasta (spaghetti or any other long noodle will work. Stroganov can also be served over rice.)
12 oz mushrooms (I reccommend shitake, but white, portabello, or maitake will also work.)
4 Tbsp creme fraiche (can be made by mixing equal parts heavy and sour cream)

recipes.name: Nashville Chicken Sandwich
ingredients: 1 1/2 Cups Cooking oil Used to fry the chicken

recipes.name: Newfoundland Cod Chowder
ingredients: 2 Tbsp Fresh Parsley or Chives, chopped

recipes.name: No-knead Bread
ingredients: 1/4 tsp instant yeast or 1.25/4 tsp active dry yeast

recipes.name: Oatmeal Pancakes
ingredients: 60ml milk (4 tbsp) (you can use water instead)
1 tsp baking powder (or baking soda + some acid to activate it)

recipes.name: Okonomiyaki
ingredients: Thinly sliced meat, any kind can do, sliced pork, beef, even bacon
Dashi powder or any desired seasonings
The following options are traditional but can be substituted with any desired toppings

recipes.name: Russian Okroshka
ingredients: 500g boiled sausage or boiled chicken meat

recipes.name: One-Pot Chicken Tetrazzini
ingredients: 5 oz Boursin Garlic and Fine Herbs
3 cup Deli Chicken, cooked and cut into bite-size pieces

recipes.name: Onion Raitha (Indian Tzatziki)
ingredients: Hint of Chilli Powder (Spicy option)/ Hint of sugar (Sweet option)

recipes.name: Orange Glorious
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate

recipes.name: Party Mimosa
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed and undiluted

recipes.name: Pasta Alla Norma
ingredients: 1 chilli (or 1 tsp of dried chilli flakes)

recipes.name: Pasta Arrabbiata
ingredients: Chilli flakes or diced chilli peppers
Crushed tomatoes (about 800 gramms for 500 gramms of pasta)
Grated Pecorino Romano or Parmigiano Reggiano (optional, but highly recommended)

recipes.name: Pasta sauce
ingredients: a can of San Marzano tomatoes (or home-grown with some extra pulp)

recipes.name: Ray Peat's Carrot Salad
ingredients: 3 raw carrots, peeled in thick vertical strips and washed thoroughly.

recipes.name: Pepper Sauce
ingredients: 1 tablespoon freshy ground rose pepper, green pepper and black pepper

recipes.name: Perfect Potato Salad
ingredients: 5 Potatoes, peeled and cut into bite-size chunks (about 2 lbs)

recipes.name: Pilaf
ingredients: 1.5kg meat (lamb or any other kind of meat)
raisins, cardamom, paprika, coriander, cinnamon, cumin, turmeric (all optional)

recipes.name: Pizza Dough
ingredients: a teensy bit of sugar (to feed the yeast)

recipes.name: Pizza sauce
ingredients: 400g canned tomatoes, preferebly skinned and whole

recipes.name: Slow-cooked Pork Carnitas
ingredients: 6 cloves of garlic, cut into slivers
¾ cup low sodium chicken broth

recipes.name: Bitoque - Portuguese Steak with Beer Sauce
Potato Leek Soup
ingredients: 11 ounces peeled and sliced waxy potatoes

recipes.name: Potato Soup
ingredients: Potatoes (yellow or brown), I don't count but 10+

recipes.name: Pozharskiye Cutlets
ingredients: Butter (originally, 1 part butter per 2 parts chicken; 1/4 works perfectly fine)
Eggs (~1 egg per 500g chicken, plus 3-5 for the breading)
A couple white bread loaves (store-bought breadcrumbs also suffice, but require more eggs)

recipes.name: Quarkbällchen – Fried curd balls
ingredients: 420ml quark (plain yoghurt can be used as a replacement)
(Optional) Alcohol by eye so that they do not soak up so much oil

recipes.name: Quesadilla
ingredients: 1-2 tortillas. Any brand works, but you can decide if you want the tortilla folded in half, or 2 tortillas together.
~4 small pinches of (Mozzarella, Oaxaca, or Montery Jack cheese).
A thin coating of oil on the pan. It will be more traditional, but also more unhealthy. (Optional)
Any ingredients you want. ie, veggies, chicken, mushrooms (cooked), or beans

recipes.name: Quiche Lorraine - Lothringer Käsetorte
ingredients: For the Baking Tin: More Butter and Flour

recipes.name: Quick Breakfast Spaghetti
ingredients: Ground spices (I like to use cumin, turmeric, paprika, and garlic)
Tomato Paste/Sauce (preferably one with basil and without preservative)

recipes.name: Ratatouille
ingredients: 140g Tomato Paste (optional if tomatoes aren't yummy)

recipes.name: Red Lentil Dahl
ingredients: 1 cup Fresh Cilantro, chopped and lightly packed
Dried Red Chili's or cayenne pepper, to taste

recipes.name: Red Sauce (Ragu all'Italiana)
ingredients: 2 tbsp. Olive oil (she used mazola oil)

recipes.name: Rice
ingredients: lime and cilantro (optional, for a Mexican taste)

recipes.name: Ricotta
ingredients: 500ml of milk (or if not using whey, 2l of milk)
6g of citric acid (contained in 130ml of lemon juice)

recipes.name: Roasted chicken breast
ingredients: 1/4 stick of butter per chicken breast

recipes.name: Schinkenfleckerl überbacken, Viennese Mac'n'Cheese
ingredients: 1kg cooked fusilli noodles or small square flat noodles (=Fleckerl)

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Seafood Pasta
ingredients: white wine (Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc recommended)

recipes.name: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: 1 tbsp. of sweet or smoked paprika

recipes.name: 'Shrimp Fettuccine Alfredo'
ingredients: 1/3 cup milk (more milk for thinner sauce)
Pasta noodles of choice (e.g. approximately 9oz of fettuccine noodles)

recipes.name: Simple Chicken Curry
ingredients: 1 ½ lbs Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts

recipes.name: Slow-cooked Lamb with Lemon
ingredients: Lamb shoulder, or something similar, like lamb shank, preferably on the bone. Get something that will fit in your pot, with room for vegetables around it. For example, I usually get half a shoulder, 2 – 3 lbs, 1 – 1.5kg.

recipes.name: Smoked Salmon Pasta Primavera
ingredients: 1/3 lb Smoked Salmon, cut into wide strips

recipes.name: Sourdough bread with seeds and grains
Spaghetti all'amatriciana
ingredients: Pecorino romano cheese preferably or Parmesan 1.5oz (40g)
Fresh chili pepper (as many as you'd like)

recipes.name: Spicy Sausage Pasta
ingredients: A large glass of red wine (approx. 250ml)

recipes.name: Spinach-Rice Casserole
ingredients: A few dashes each - Nutmeg; Cayenne; Paprika

recipes.name: Stir Fried Chicken with an Orange Sauce
Stoofvlees
ingredients: 1kg chuck roast, cut in bite-sized pieces
2 tablespoons of belgian apple/pear syrup (optional, ill write up a recipe for this soon)

recipes.name: Tabouleh
ingredients: 2 cups Very Hot Water (or as directed)

recipes.name: Taco Meat
ingredients: 1 pound (about 500 g) ground beef or turkey
1 medium onion, finely chopped (or 1 1/2 teaspoon onion powder)
1 medium tomato, chopped (or 1 small can of tomato sauce)
1 teaspoon chili powder (or 1/3 teaspoon each oregano, cumin, garlic powder)
dash of pepper (1/8 teaspoon or less)

recipes.name: 'Tahini short bread'
ingredients: Any toppings if desired (chocolate chips, ...) although it is very enjoyable on its own.

recipes.name: Tajine Maadnous
ingredients: 1 small bunch parsley (about 1.5 cups, chopped, loosely packed)

recipes.name: Tanzanian Tea w/ Milk
ingredients: Black Ceylon Tea (Preferably, you want a dark, herbal flavor from your tea. I have some from Dar es Salaam,
Sweetener (Sugar, Syrup, Monk Fruit extract, etc.) (optional, but recommended)

recipes.name: Tofu and Cashew Chow Mein
ingredients: 2 Tbsp Peanut Oil or other suitable frying oil
6 oz Firm Tofu, cut into cubes

recipes.name: Tofu Stir Fry
ingredients: One block of extra firm tofu
Vegetables per your choice, recommendations include:

recipes.name: Tomato and Grilled Bell Pepper soup
Torrijas
ingredients: Dried bread (or Torrijas bread). Must be bread from a regular loaf, not from a tin loaf.
Milk (to soak the bread, 2 cups per 16 torrijas approx.)
Eggs (to coat the bread, 2 eggs per 16 torrijas approx.)

recipes.name: Torta Frita Criolla (Argentinian frybread)
ingredients: 1/2 cup of water mixed with a teaspoon of salt.
Oil or grease of choice for frying. (Modern Argentines use refined tallow or sunflower seed oil, but for the real gaucho way, unrefined lard or tallow is the right choice)
Sugar, cinnamon, or herbs and spices of choice (Optional)

recipes.name: Tuh'u
ingredients: 450 g of lamb leg meat, diced
4 tbsp of sesame oil, olive oil, or rendered fat
2 tsp of cumin seeds, crushed or powdered
3-9 cloves of garlic, minced or diced

recipes.name: Simple Tuna Salad
ingredients: 2 tablespoons white vinegar or lemon juice (optional)

recipes.name: Tuna Sub
ingredients: 1 recipe of your favorite tuna salad
Sandwich bun or bread (a good one)
Other sandwich toppings (very little out of bounds here).

recipes.name: Smoked Turkey
ingredients: 1 lb mixed vegetables (carrots, potatoes, broccoli, etc.) (optional)

recipes.name: Tuscan Style Pork Roast
ingredients: ⅓ cup high quality olive oil

recipes.name: Ukrainian Borscht
ingredients: 4 Tbsp ketchup or 3 Tbsp tomato sauce
1 can white cannelini beans with their juice (optional)

recipes.name: Ukrainian Vareniki
ingredients: 3 ½ cups finely chopped button mushrooms

recipes.name: Wholemeal Pizza
ingredients: arugula salad (add after pizza is done) (optional)
fresh basil leaves (add after pizza is done) (optional)

recipes.name: Zaatar
ingredients: 1 Cup Zaatar leaves (without the stalks), cleaned and dried.
Optional: citric acid salt, for extra kick if the Sumac wasn't enough for you.
